*.description: May see CI status results for all repositories
May modify and set CI status results for all repositories

readCIStatus.description: May read status tags from CI servers

writeCIStatus.description: May set status tags for CI servers

ignoreChangesetStatus.label: Ignore changeset status
ignoreChangesetStatus.helpText: If this is checked, only status send for the pull request are taken into account.

CIStatusAllSuccessRule.name: All CI status successful
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.description_includeChangesetStatus: Every CI status is successful (including changeset status).
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.description_ignoreChangesetStatus: Every CI status is successful (changeset status will be ignored).
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.failed: At least one CI status is not successful.
CIStatusAllSuccessRule.obstacle: At least one CI status is not successful.

CIStatusXSuccessRule.name: Number of CI status successful
CIStatusXSuccessRule.description_includeChangesetStatus: At least {{ numberOfSuccessful }} CI status are successful (including changeset status).
CIStatusXSuccessRule.description_ignoreChangesetStatus: At least {{ numberOfSuccessful }} CI status are successful (changeset status will be ignored).
CIStatusXSuccessRule.success: A sufficient number of CI status are successful.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.failed: Only {{ current }} of {{ expected }} required successful CI status present.
CIStatusXSuccessRule.obstacle: Not enough successful CI status available.

numberOfSuccessful.label: Quantity
numberOfSuccessful.helpText: Minimum number of successful CI status.
numberOfSuccessful.errorMessage: The value must be bigger than 0.

CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.name: Named CI status successful
CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.description: The CI status with name '{{ name }}' of type '{{ type }}' is successful.
CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.success: The CI status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is successful.

failed.CiStatusNotSuccessful: The CI status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is not successful.
failed.CiStatusMissing: The CI status {{ type }}:{{ name }} is missing.

CIStatusNamedSuccessRule.obstacle: The named CI status is not successful or not available.

type.label: Type
type.helpText: The type of the CI status (e.g. 'jenkins')
type.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.

name.label: Name
name.helpText: The name of the CI status (e.g. 'test' or 'build')
name.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.

CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.name: All CI status of type successful
CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.description: Every CI status of type '{{ type }}' is successful.
CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.success: Every CI status of type '{{ type }}' is successful.

failed.CiStatusNotSuccessful: Not all CI status of type '{{ type }}' are successful.
failed.CiStatusMissing: No CI status messages of type '{{ type }}' is present.

CIStatusOfTypeSuccessRule.obstacle: CI status of the given type are missing or not all successful.

type.label: Type
type.helpText: The type of the CI status (e.g. 'jenkins')
type.errorMessage: This field must not be blank.
